snippet: A police spokesman in Suffolk County said it appeared the blaze, which consumed areas in Manorville and Ridge last month and damaged at least 10 homes, “was not caused by natural acts of nature.”
lead_paragraph: A police spokesman in Suffolk County said it appeared the blaze, which consumed areas in Manorville and Ridge last month and damaged at least 10 homes, “was not caused by natural acts of nature.”

headline.seo: State Officials Believe Long Island Fire Was Arson
headline.main: State Officials Looking at Long Island Fire as Arson
headline.print_headline: State Officials Looking at Long Island Fire as Arson
